bundles.description: list of bundles for that validator, it may have been added multiple times if removed in between

GetValidatorAddSignerBundleResponse.title: Get Validator Add Signer Bundle Response
GetValidatorAddSignerBundleResponse.description: Maps an interval for a given market to its corresponding candle_id

signer.description: The ethereum address of the signer to be added/removed

submitter.description: The ethereum address of the submitter

nonce.description: The nonce used in the signing operation

timestamp.description: unixnano timestamp for when the validator was added

signatures.description: The bundle of signatures from current validators to sign in the new signer
